thread.title: Lisa Foti
thread.title_full: Merchant One reviewed by Lisa Foti

author: Lisa Foti
title: Lisa Foti
text: All representatives were extremely helpful and responsive. As a first time client, my experience was nothing short of fantastic. Errol especially was very thorough and patient as we were troubleshooting issues during our set up process. He even gave us his direct contact information so that we could continue to reach out specifically to him with any further questions. I definitely would recommend Merchant ONE to anyone considering processing CC transactions. BTW, I did my homework before signing on with Merchant One--Their statements are easy to read, fees are competitive and I was told their customer service was outstanding! Needless to say, I was NOT disappointed!
